entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pickering
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
